name: Mouse Steroids
short_description:
[Written in AutoIt3]
This program will auto-click the left/right/middle mouse buttons for you very quickly. It's simple to use, absolutely minimal, and that's it. Nothing more. No useless features, no complicated options.

How to Use

1.  Open Mouse Steroids.exe
2.  Read and close the pop up box (it's a how-to box)
3.  When you want to spam a mouse button, click ALT+SHIFT+(mouse button)
4.  When you want to stop spamming a mouse button, just click with that button.
(sometimes, you have to click that button a couple of times before it stops, but not usually)


>Download the .exe for just the application
>Download the .au3 for just the AutoIt3 source code
>Download the .rar or .zip for both .exe and .au3

Check out more at RandomDuck.NET
